#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long int ll;

using namespace std;

ll fact(ll n)
{
    ll f = 1;
    ll i;
    for (i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        f *= i;
        f = f % mod;
    }
    return f;
}

ll pow1(ll m, ll n) {
	if(n == 0) return 1;
	if(n == 1) return (m % mod);
	ll x = pow1(m, n / 2);
	if(n % 2) {
		return ((((x % mod)* x) % mod) * m) % mod;
	} else {
		return (((x % mod) * x) % mod);
	}
}

int main()
{
	ll t, i, j, n, k;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
		cin >> n >> k;
		cout << ((fact(n) % mod) * (pow1(fact(n - k), mod - 2)) % mod) % mod << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
